title: How The Villainess Alicia Saves The Country
alternative_title: Akujo Alicia no Kyuukoku Recipe ; How the Villainess Alicia Saves the Country ; 악녀 알리시아가 나라를 구하는 방법 ; 悪女アリシアの救国レシピ
status: Akujo Alicia no Kyuukoku Recipe ; How the Villainess Alicia Saves the Country ; 악녀 알리시아가 나라를 구하는 방법 ; 悪女アリシアの救国レシピ
description:
Description :
        Read manhwa How the villainess Alicia saves the countryA regular nurse who finishes her night shift ends up in a car accident on her way home. When she wakes up, she finds herself in a prison. The body she inhabits belongs to Alicia, the infamous villainess and princess of the Arjan Kingdom, a great trading nation.Although a princess, Alicia is despised by her father and sister for being the daughter of a concubine. She grows up as a twisted villainess and is exiled to the enemy nation, Ostreb, after injuring the crown prince.She becomes one of the emperor's 13 consorts, with the goal of surviving by becoming the empress, but she's placed at the very bottom of the hierarchy. Her reputation is the worst, and her magical abilities are nonexistent.However, with her modern-day cooking skills and medical knowledge, she's determined to survive using the skills and determination she developed as a nurse!
